project_info.name: Lyo Learning Platform
project_info.description: Advanced AI-powered learning platform with recursive A2UI components

architecture.overview: Server-driven UI architecture with recursive A2UI components

presentation.description: SwiftUI-based iOS client with recursive component rendering

api.description: FastAPI-based REST API with WebSocket support

testing.overview: Comprehensive testing framework with multiple test types

test_suites.name: Performance Optimizations
test_suites.description: Tests caching, lazy loading, and performance features

test_suites.name: AI Classroom Features
test_suites.description: Tests real-time sync and adaptive learning

test_suites.name: Advanced A2UI Components
test_suites.description: Tests video, coding, and collaboration components

basic_usage.code:
# Create a simple learning card
learning_card = A2UIFactory.card(
    A2UIFactory.text("Welcome to Python", style="title"),
    A2UIFactory.text("Let's start learning!", style="body"),
    A2UIFactory.button("Begin", "start_learning"),
    title="Getting Started"
)

# Convert to JSON for iOS
ui_json = learning_card.model_dump()

advanced_components.code:
# Create a complete learning experience
learning_ui = A2UIFactory.vstack(
    # Video lesson
    A2UIFactory.video_player(
        "https://example.com/python-intro.mp4",
        title="Python Introduction",
        chapters=[
            {"timestamp": 0, "title": "Overview"},
            {"timestamp": 300, "title": "Variables"}
        ]
    ),

    # Interactive coding exercise
    A2UIFactory.code_sandbox(
        language="python",
        title="Try it yourself",
        initial_code="name = input('What is your name?')\nprint(f'Hello, {name}!')",
        hints=["Use the input() function", "Use f-strings for formatting"]
    ),

    # Collaboration space
    A2UIFactory.collaboration_space(
        title="Discussion",
        collaboration_types=["real_time_editing", "chat"]
    ),

    spacing=20
)

real_time_session.code:
# Start a collaborative session
session = await realtime_sync.join_session(
    user_id="student_123",
    course_id="python_fundamentals",
    device_type="mobile"
)

# Track learning progress
await adaptive_engine.track_performance(
    user_id="student_123",
    course_id="python_fundamentals",
    lesson_id="variables_lesson",
    performance_data={
        "completion_rate": 0.85,
        "accuracy_rate": 0.78,
        "time_spent_minutes": 25
    }
)

# Get adaptive recommendations
recommendations = await adaptive_engine.get_recommendations("student_123")
